    def test_safe(self,test_title,privatekey,publickey,networkCode,symbol,to_add,amount):
    
        with allure.step("创建安全账户"):
            acc = Http.HttpUtils.create_safe_account("safe",networkCode,publickey[0])

            assert acc.json()["status"] == "inactive"
            from_add = acc.json()["address"]

            Httpcore.HttpCoreUtils.core_parent_account_transfer_nativecoin(networkCode,from_add)
